title: Drawing, "Cornelia, Mother of the Gracchi, Palazzo Cavina, Faenza", 1816
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and light brown wash over black chalk on rolled paper
inscribed: Inscribed in ink, inside an octagon: Corneglia madre dei Grachi, Faenza Casa Cavina
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Cornelia, Mother of the Gracchi, Palazzo Cavina, Faenza", 1816.
1816. Pen and brown ink, brush and light brown wash over black chalk on rolled paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2003.
